p.dialogue: I'm really excited.$h#$b#I'm going to be your wife. Hehe.$l
I need to get mentally prepared for being a farmer's wife.
...$l#$e#I'm a little nervous. But happy.$h
I've always dreamed of living on a farm.$h#$e#I'm going to be so happy.
I'm so happy!$h#$e#It's just like I always dreamed.$l
It's okay. I know we can't have a honeymoon, since your farm needs to be taken care of.#$e#I'm a farmer now, too!
@.. I'm a little scared. This is such a big change!#$e#Don't worry, I'm really happy, too.$h
We're going to have a little farm family, soon.$l#$e#I'm so glad you feel this way about me.$h
Hehe. Me? Married? I never thought this would happen.$h#$e#We're going to have a lot of fun together.$h
I'm engaged to a farmer. Wow!$h#$e#Our lives are going to be a lot different from now on.$l
I'm going to be really happy as your husband, @.$l#$e#I'm excited.
I never dreamed this would happen. I'm so lucky.$l#$e#I can't wait till the wedding.$h
In a couple days I'm going to be living on a farm. I can't believe it.$h#$e#I'm happy, though.$l
When you showed up in town, I never thought I'd be marrying you some day.$l#$e#Life is strange, huh?$h
Oh my goodness! I have so much to prepare before the wedding! I'm nervous.$l#$e#I'll be relieved after we're all settled in on your farm.$h
I'm really happy.$h#$e#This was always my secret wish.$l
The farm will be such a lovely place to write. I'm really looking forward to this.$h#$e#We're going to make a great pair.$l
This is going to be such an adventure! I'm really excited. Aren't you?$h#$e#We can use my cottage as a beach house.$l
@, this is the greatest thing that could have happened.$l#$e#I can't wait.$h
I'm going to love being a farmer.$h
Part of me is wondering if this isn't all some elaborate prank.#$e#I can't believe you'd actually want to marry someone like me.
@... My head's spinning, and I haven't even had a beer today.
Can you believe we're about to move in together? I've never lived with anyone but my family.#$e#It's... exciting.
I always knew something important would happen between us... I just never thought it would be this!$h#$e#The parrot is excited too.
@... I'm afraid we'll have to keep this a secret... Neither my people nor yours would accept us living together.
You know I'll be a very strange person to live with, right? I won't be able to leave the house...
